function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Occupancy levels not reduced leading to increased risk of disease transmission","Impact":"Higher likelihood of disease spread within the built environment","Mitigation":"Implement staggered timetables and purging of rooms between events","Technologies":"Room occupancy management systems, ventilation systems, cleaning technologies","People":"Occupants, staff, visitors","Owner":"Building management, facility operators"},{"Description":"Inadequate purging of rooms between events leading to higher concentration of virus-laden particles","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission to the next occupants","Mitigation":"Ensure thorough purging and cleaning of rooms between events, increase outdoor air supply rate","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, cleaning technologies","People":"Occupants, staff, visitors","Owner":"Building management, facility operators"},{"Description":"Ineffective room-change time scale calculations leading to inadequate purging of rooms","Impact":"Inaccurate estimation of purging effectiveness and increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Use accurate room-change time scale calculations, consider professional guidance","Technologies":"Building management software for air supply rate estimation, expert consultation","People":"Occupants, staff, building management","Owner":"Building management, facility operators"}]}
